description:
Go to https://brilliant.org/nutshell/ to dive deeper into these topics and more with a free 30-day trial + 20% off the premium subscription! 
This video was sponsored by Brilliant. Thanks a lot for the support!

Scared of an AI takeover? We have just what you need – the Survival Kit for the Future! Visit our shop to gear up now, but hurry, stocks are highly limited: https://shop.kgs.link/SurvivalKit

Sources & further reading:
https://sites.google.com/view/sources-superintelligence/

Humans rule Earth without competition. But we are about to create something that may change that: our last invention, the most powerful tool, weapon, or maybe even entity: Artificial Super intelligence. This sounds like science fiction, so let’s start at the beginning.
